basic_node.title: Broadened returned pulse profile
basic_node.description: Increased cross section of beam returning from object.
basic_node.references: [re1, https://www.semanticscholar.org/paper/NORMALIZATION-OF-LIDAR-INTENSITY-DATA-BASED-ON-AND-Jutzi-Gross/91fc1c40a8168bf6060642a01ff456a36e42ebe0, Impact of broadened pulse profile on returned beam intensity considered being equivalent to impact of divergence of pulse.]
